ModMetaData.name: Ecotech
ModMetaData.author: Sepphoris,NightmareCorporation
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Version: 1.0 (last updated @ 2.19.2024, ~4:00PM PST)
====================
A mod that introduces the ability to grow weapons and defenses in your garden, rather than machining them together.
Currently introduces terraweapons, which only require a green thumb to plant, and patience to grow. They are just as effective as fabricated weapons, giving you a 100% all-natural, viable alternative to your colony defenses.
However, terraweapons require highly fertile soil, take a significant amount of time to grow, and will wither over time.
This was originally is intended to provide decent weapons and equipment during a tech-limited, magic playthrough. No more relying on just bows!
More additions, such as other weapons, turrets, traps, and even armor will come over time!
====================
Latest Minor Update: -
Latest Major Features and Changes:
-Tribal Colonies gain access to Terraseed knowledge immediately, due to this mod being intended as a total alternative to mechanical weapons. Industrial+ colonies will needs to pour significant time into understanding this exclusive tribal power.
-New Terraweapon: Prima Turret, a short-range turret that requires fertile soil instead of electricity.
-New Terraweapon: Prima Seedburster, an organic ballistic launcher.
-New Terraweapon: Royal Hyperstem, which is the first in a new line of Terraweapons, and can only (currently) be bought (seeds will come later once more weapons are made; colonies using Ideology can aqcuire it via relic)
-Added Surge Seed research, which unlocks seeds for constructed/building-based equipment (like turrets and traps).
-Added a teaser research for future additions.
-Stake Caster is now an entry weapon.
-Simplified a couple researches; entry researches cost slightly more, but provides more weapons, and will provide more over time. Be aware these changes might impact early research progress. Any errors referencing them are one-time, and can be safely ignored.
-Please report balancing and bug issues on the workshop page!
